com.clicksmob.sdk

Class Offers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clicksmob.sdk.Offers

  • public class Offers
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of Clicksmob Offers Java SDK, which contains only one com.clicksmob.sdk.Offers class

    Generally, it's used in the following manner: 

        AuthenticationObjectUserPassword authUserPassword = new AuthenticationObjectUserPassword(
             AuthenticationObjectUserPassword.URL_API_LOGIN_DEFAULT, userAccountName, userPassword );
    Offers offers = new Offers( Offers.URL_API_DEFAULT );
    offers.init( authUserPassword );  
    for( OfferPresentation offerPresentation : offers.getAllOffers() )
    {
       // ...
       System.out.println( offerPresentation.toString() );
    }
    // ...
    List listOfPlatforms;
    // ...
    List listOfCountries;
    // ...
    for( OfferPresentation offerPresentation : offers.getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries( listOfPlatforms, listOfCountries ) )
    {
       System.out.println( offerPresentation.toString() );
       // ...
       for( UserPayout userPayout : offerPresentation.userPayouts )
       {
         System.out.println( "\t" + userPayout.toString() );
       }
       System.out.println();
    }
    See Also:
    Offers, Offers(String), init(AuthenticationObject), getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries(Collection, Collection), getAllOffers()

    • Method Detail

      • getAllOffers

        public java.util.List<OfferPresentation> getAllOffers()
        Gets all offers.
        Returns:
        all offers
        See Also:
        getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries(Collection, Collection)

      • getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries

        public java.util.List<OfferPresentation> getOffersForPlatformsAndCountries(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> platforms,
                                                                  java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> countries)
        Gets the offers for platforms and countries. For the empty list of platforms, all offers for any platform will be returned. For the empty list of countries, all offers for any country will be returned
        Parameters:
        platforms - the platforms
        countries - the countries
        Returns:
        the offers for platforms and countries
        See Also:
        getAllOffers()

        public void init(AuthenticationObject authObject)
          throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                 java.io.IOException,
                 ClicksmobException
        Inits an instance of the com.clicksmob.sdk.Offers with a newly created authentication object.
        Parameters:

        Throws:

        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        ClicksmobException - the clicksmob exception
        See Also:
